RinUI DocumentationA Fluent Design UI Library for Qt Quick

With just a simple configuration, you can quickly develop an elegant Fluent-style UI interface.

What is RinUI?
Quick Start
‚ú®

Good Fluent Design Controls

RinUI will provide a series of meticulously crafted Fluent Design style controls.

‚ö°

Easy to Use

RinUI's controls are designed in conjunction with QML built-in controls. With just a simple configuration, you can quickly develop an elegant Fluent-style UI interface.

ü™Ñ

Theme System

RinUI offers light and dark theme switching and supports custom configuration files (to be improved).
